snippet: Pro-government forces in Yemen have fired mortar shells in the southern city of Taiz after two days of clashes there with armed tribesmen, killing seven people and seriously injuring 10.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Pro-government forces in Yemen have fired mortar shells in the southern city of Taiz after two days of clashes there with armed tribesmen, killing seven people and seriously injuring 10.

headline.main: Yemen: Pro-Government Forces Fire Mortar Shells at Foes
headline.seo: Yemen: Pro-Government Forces Fire at Foes
